entry.p: While cranking on some internationalization work this afternoon, I decided to listen to an old iTunes playlist I made entitled "Frisson" (a.k.a. songs that give me goosebumps):

ul.li: "Águas de Março" by Elis Regina and Tom Jobim
"Love is the Only Goal" by Wendy Waldman
"She Moves Through the Fair" by Fairport Convention
"Are We in Trouble Now" by Mark Knopfler
